Large Language Models: Methods and Applications / Fall 2025

Updates

  • Updates and announcements will be posted here.


Course Description

Large Language Models Methods and Applications (11-667) is a graduate-level course that aims to provide a holistic view of the current state of large language models.

Logistics

Class

  • Location: Baker Hall A51
  • Time: Tuesdays and Thursdays 2 PM - 3:20 PM

Office Hours

  • Jaromir: TBD
  • Yubin: TBD
  • TAs: TBD

Contacting the Instructors

For all questions related to course materials, please post to Piazza.

For questions about grades, accomodations, or any other specific situation, reach out to the instructor email: llms-11-667@andrew.cmu.edu. Any course-related emails sent to other addresses will be ignored.
